title: On to Cloudflare
summary:
Long story short: if you're reading this, you're reading it on my site now hosted at Cloudflare.  I'd had it hosted at Netlify for quite a while but I wanted a bit more granular control and a quicker pace of development, so here we are. The transition was about as smooth as I could've hoped for and looked like this:
Disable DNSSEC
Wait for the change to propagate
Configure DNSControl for my domains while waiting, incorporating 1Password
Move my images from Netlify's CDN to bunny...

title: A golden path to secure cloud provisioning with The Infrastructure Cloud
summary: This post was originally published on the HashiCorp blog. There are three telling security statistics in modern cloud and hybrid environments:Data breaches cost an average of $4. 5 million per incident74% of breaches involve a human element9 out of 10 web application breaches result from stolen credentialsThese three stats compel security and platform teams to closely examine their approach to cloud infrastructure security workflows from Day-0 through Day-N...
